title: Two Michelin Stars Meet Plant-Based: Tim Raue x Planted
excerpt: When Germany's most celebrated chef puts planted on his menu, you know we're doing something right.
content: Tim Raue doesn't compromise on quality. The two-Michelin-star chef is known for his exacting standards and bold Asian-inspired flavors. So when he approached us about featuring planted products at Restaurant Tim Raue in Berlin, we knew we had to deliver something extraordinary. The result: a series of exclusive dishes including a vegan Peking duck salad using planted.pulled, and Chicken with Jerusalem artichoke, hazelnut and truffle featuring planted.chicken. Fine dining meets sustainable eating.
author: Planted Team
